select balanceRange, count(*) as memberCount from ( select case when total_balance = 0 then '无余额' when total_balance between 1 and 10000 then '0-100元' when total_balance between 10001 and 50000 then '100-500元' when total_balance between 50001 and 100000 then '500-1000元' else '1000元以上' end as balanceRange, case when total_balance = 0 then 1 when total_balance between 1 and 10000 then 2 when total_balance between 10001 and 50000 then 3 when total_balance between 50001 and 100000 then 4 else 5 end as sortOrder from ( select memberid, sum(balance) as total_balance from card where lose = 0 group by memberid ) as member_balance ) as categorized group by balanceRange, sortOrder order by sortOrder
